Name: Activiti Modeler
Creator: Alfresco and the Activiti community
Features: Modeler, Simulation, Execution. Data elements are not supported. Limited supported formats (read/saved internally in BPMN format without exporting capabilities).

Name: ActiveVOS
Creator: Informatica
Features: Modeling, Testing and Execution with open standards.

Name: ADONIS (software)
Creator: BOC Information Technologies Consulting AG
Features: Business Process Analysis (BPA) tool supporting business process management allowing process modeling, analysis, simulation, evaluation, publishing and automation. Freeware Community Edition available.

Name: ARIS Express
Creator: Software AG
Features: Limited supported formats (read: proprietary, Microsoft Visio, write: proprietary, EMF, PDF).

Name: BiZZdesign Architect
Creator: BiZZdesign
Features: Modeler, Integrate with ArchiMate, User collaboration, Support for Collaboration diagrams, BPMN 2.0 XML Export & Import, Web reporting, Paper reporting, Touchscreen interface available

Name: Bonita BPM
Creator: Bonitasoft
Features: Bonita BPM combines three solutions in one: a Studio for process modeling, a BPM & Workflow engine, and a user interface? enabling to create standalone process-based applications. Supports several formats (read: BPMN, jBPM, Bonita, XPDL
Schema example: write: Bonita, BPMN2, PNG, JPG, GIF, PDF, BMP, SVG). Does not support Data elements. Does a lot of validations at runtime. Boundary events are transparent.

Name: Edraw Max
Creator: EdrawSoft
Features: Modeler, Simulation, Execution. Supported vsdx, eps, pdf and svg formats.

Name: Enterprise Architect
Creator: Sparx Systems
Features: Includes BPMN, BPEL, UML, SysML, BPMN 2.0 XML Import/Export, XSD, WSDL and supports BPMN Simulation

Name: Flowable Modeler
Creator: Flowable and the Flowable community
Features: Modeler, Simulation, Execution. Data elements are not supported. .

Name: IBM Rational System Architect
Creator: IBM
Features: Enterprise Architecture tool supporting BPMN 2.0 notation (and bidirectional BPMN 2.0 interchange) integrated within EA frameworks such as TOGAF, DoDAF, Archimate, and others. A thin-client sister product, SA/XT, allows creation of BPMN 2.0 models on the web. An SA Design Manager extension publishes the EA with BPMN to web in [RDF] format allowing [SPARQL] queries to produce open-social-gadget dashboards.

Name: Imixs-BPMN
Creator: Imixs
Features: Modeling tool based on Eclipse BPMN project which takes the full advantage of all the capabilities of the BPMN standard and complements them with the features of a powerful workflow engine

Name: LucidChart
Creator: Lucid Software Inc
Features: Google App / Google Drive integration, supports Visio files, JIRA integration, Confluence integration
Software license: Proprietary - 14-day free trial on team accounts / Free professional accounts for educators and students / Free version

Name: Microsoft Visio 2013
Creator: Microsoft
Features: BPMN2 Modeling and validation. Support for Data Input/Output (Excel, SharePoint...). No BPMN file format support (read: Visio, Visio Workflow Interchange
Schema example: write: Visio, SVG, Autocad, HTML, EMF, GIF, JPG, PDF, PNG, TIFF, BMP, WMF, XPS).

Name: Modelio
Creator: Modeliosoft
Features: Includes BPMN, UML, SysML, Java round trip code generation, documentation, TOGAF, XSD, WSDL. The boundary events interrupting/non-interrupting symbols are inverted.

Name: Signavio Process Manager [13]
Creator: Signavio
Features: Cloud-based enterprise business process managing tool supporting analysis, modeling, simulation and execution of process models.

Name: SYDLE SEED Community
Creator: SYDLE Systems
Features: Supports modeling and execution of processes

Name: yEd
Creator: yWorks
Features: Stores graphics in internal format. Cannot load/save BPMN 2.0 files.
